description:
Helps to visualize most frequent, slowest, failed queries.
Shows queries rate per second, table with last queries

targets.formattedQuery:
$rateColumns(
    substring(query,  1,  45) AS query,
    count() c)
FROM $table
WHERE
    cityHash64(query) global in (
    SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  45)) AS h
    FROM $table
    WHERE
        $timeFilter
        AND type in ($type)
        AND initial_user in ($user)
        AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
    GROUP BY h
    ORDER BY count() desc
    LIMIT $top)
    AND type in ($type)
    AND initial_user in ($user)
    AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.query:
$rateColumns(
    substring(query,  1,  45) AS query,
    count() c)
FROM $table
WHERE
    cityHash64(query) global in (
    SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  45)) AS h
    FROM $table
    WHERE
        $timeFilter
        AND type in ($type)
        AND initial_user in ($user)
        AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
    GROUP BY h
    ORDER BY count() desc
    LIMIT $top)
    AND type in ($type)
    AND initial_user in ($user)
    AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.rawQuery: SELECT t, arrayMap(a -> (a.1, a.2/runningDifference( t/1000 )), groupArr) FROM (SELECT t, groupArray((query, c)) as groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t, substring(query,  1,  45) AS query, count() c FROM system.query_log WHERE event_date >= toDate(1498209947) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209947) AND      cityHash64(query) global in (     SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  45)) AS h     FROM system.query_log     WHERE         event_date >= toDate(1498209947) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209947)         AND type in (1,2,3,4)         AND initial_user in ('default')         AND('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1))     GROUP BY h     ORDER BY count() desc     LIMIT 5)     AND type in (1,2,3,4)     AND initial_user in ('default')     AND('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY t, query  ORDER BY t) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t)

panels.title: Top $top request's rate by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

panels.content:
1 - successful start of query execution

2 - successful end of query execution

3 - exception before start of query execution

4 - exception while query execution
panels.title: Types

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    avg(query_duration_ms) duration,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY query
ORDER BY duration desc
LIMIT $top
targets.query:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    avg(query_duration_ms) duration,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY query
ORDER BY duration desc
LIMIT $top
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     rand() as t,     substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,     avg(query_duration_ms) duration,     count() count FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1498209947) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209947)     AND type in (1,2,3,4)     and initial_user in ('default')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY query ORDER BY duration desc LIMIT 5

panels.title: Top slow queries by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    avg(memory_usage) usage,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY query
ORDER BY usage desc
LIMIT $top
targets.query:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    avg(memory_usage) usage,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY query
ORDER BY usage desc
LIMIT $top
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     rand() as t,     substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,     avg(memory_usage) usage,     count() count FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1498209947) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209947)     AND type in (1,2,3,4)     and initial_user in ('default')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY query ORDER BY usage desc LIMIT 5

panels.title: Top memory consumers by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    type,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in (3,4)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY
    query,
    type
ORDER BY count desc
LIMIT $top
targets.query:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    type,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in (3,4)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY
    query,
    type
ORDER BY count desc
LIMIT $top
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     rand() as t,     substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,     type,     count() count FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1498209947) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209947)     AND type in (3,4)     and initial_user in ('default')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY     query,     type ORDER BY count desc LIMIT 5

panels.title: Top failed queries by user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery:
$rate(count() c)
FROM $table
where  type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.query:
$rate(count() c)
FROM $table
where  type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.rawQuery: SELECT t, c/runningDifference(t/1000) cRate FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t, count() c FROM system.query_log WHERE event_date >= toDate(1498209895) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209895) AND   type in (1,2,3,4)     and initial_user in ('default')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t)

panels.title: Reqs/s by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms)  select_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
    and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'select') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms)  select_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
    and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'select') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t,     avg(query_duration_ms)  select_duration FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1498209895) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209895)     AND type = 2     and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'select') = 1     and initial_user in ('default') GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms) insert_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'insert into') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms) insert_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'insert into') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t,     avg(query_duration_ms) insert_duration FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1498209895) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209895)     AND type = 2 and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'insert into') = 1     and initial_user in ('default') GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    event_time,
    user,
    query_duration_ms duration,
    memory_usage memory,
    if(exception!='', 'fail', 'success') result,
    concat(substring(query,1,120), '...') query
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
ORDER BY event_time DESC
LIMIT 1000
targets.query:
SELECT
    event_time,
    user,
    query_duration_ms duration,
    memory_usage memory,
    if(exception!='', 'fail', 'success') result,
    concat(substring(query,1,120), '...') query
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
ORDER BY event_time DESC
LIMIT 1000
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     event_time,     user,     query_duration_ms duration,     memory_usage memory,     if(exception!='', 'fail', 'success') result,     concat(substring(query,1,120), '...') query FROM system.query_log WHERE event_date >= toDate(1498209895) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209895)     AND type in (1,2,3,4)     and initial_user in ('default')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 1000

panels.title: Query log by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

list.label: initial user
list.name: user
list.query: select distinct initial_user from system.query_log where event_date >= today()-3 and event_time > toDateTime(today()-3)

title: ClickHouse Queries
